name: ZEfix
description: Mod aimed at correcting the shortcomings of the units created during the creation of polish H3 editions, notably the Polish Gold Edition and polish GOG version. It is based on the Hellburn patch
author: Kammer, Dydzio

1.1.2: Improved mod description, changed path to workaroud potential VCMI mods virtual filesystem issue where same relative paths from multiple mods result in shadowing mod files
1.1.1: Now angels costs 3000 gold and one pile of gems
